text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I am――the Uma Musume who will win against that 
unbeatable Brian-chan! ……Laurel. I'm Sakura Laurel♪

The Uma Musume that can't run, Sakura Laurel, just declared 
that she would win against Narita Brian. However……

If you can't run, then you can't win. 
That part concerned me……
choice_data_list: I want to know. Why can't you run?
I want to know. Why can't you run?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Ah, um……well, about that…… 
Of course, I don't mean that I can't run at all……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
……right, if it's just a little, maybe it should be fine. 
In which case, we can head to the course now……

text_block_list.name: 2 Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Wait just a minute!

When Sakura Laurel was about to head to the course, 
two Uma Musume came rushing towards her.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Laurel-san, please don't push yourself~! 
Suddenly running without any kind of warm-up is reckless~.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed! I can't just let that pass! 
After all, I'm a class rep!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Hello, nice to meet you! I'm Sakura Bakushin O! 
The class rep that always goes full throttle, Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I'm Sakura Chiyono O. I've always been in Laurel-san's 
care since I was young. Together with Laurel-san, we're――

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: Uma Musume from the 『Victory Club』!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Right! It's a long story, but……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
But before that! Laurel-san, please take more 
care of yourself. After all, um, your legs……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu, thank you for worrying about me, Chiyo-chan. 
You're right, ever since I was little, my legs……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Have been called 『Legs of Glass』.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah, in regards to that, let me explain.

After that, Sakura Bakushin O began 
telling me about their younger days.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The 『Victory Club』 that we are a part of is a place for 
little Uma Musume to gather. It's a famous training club.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The club's policies are 『Always carry strong feelings!』 
and 『Be positive, and full of energy!』. Due to that……

text_block_list.name: Young Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Everyone, make way, make way! 
You are in the presence of the king of Yamato!

text_block_list.name: Young Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text:
No way, no way! Because I'm the king of the world. 
When I run, of course, I'm the best in the world~!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It was a gathering place for Uma Musume with the name O, 
and the attitude of O. And among those girls, Laurel-san was……

text_block_list.name: Young Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Um, I'm sorry. 
I can't run very well yet. But……

text_block_list.name: Young Laurel
text_block_list.text:
So I'm not a bother, I'll do my best! 
And I'll help out with anything I can♪

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Compared to the other girls, she was more reserved 
but still positive. She was also very caring and was 
always there to help when anyone got in trouble.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Laurel-san was like everyone's big sister. 
She can keep track of so many things at the same time.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
It's because……since the beginning, my legs 
have been weak♪ Often, I'd have to keep calm, 
otherwise I couldn't properly cover for you.
choice_data_list: Then, by 『Legs of Glass』 you mean……
Then, by 『Legs of Glass』 you mean……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Ever since I was young, my legs haven't 
been very sturdy so I couldn't run very much.

An Uma Musume but she couldn't run…… 
I wonder how stressful that was.

An Uma Musume with 『Legs of Glass』, Sakura Laurel. 
But then, why did she……
choice_data_list: Then why did you come to Tracen?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Well, that's because-

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, wait a minute. Maybe calling it 『Legs of Glass』 
is causing a misunderstanding. In that case……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
I can show you some footage from a mock race. 
I've got a video of the three of us running together 
when Laurel-san was in good condition.

Saying that, Sakura Chiyono O showed me the 
video on her smartphone. And what I saw was……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fortune favors the fast!! Oriyaaaaaaaa!! 
Just Bakushin, Bakushin!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Kuuuuuu, Bakushin O-san, you're fast……! 
But……if I just keep up with you until the end~……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(Baku-chan……Chiyo-chan……they're both amazing…… 
Compared to them, the amount of training I do is nothing……)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(But, even then……I'm happy! This is fun……! 
I can run as much as I want……in this moment……!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
(Right……I will bloom! 
Don't think about what comes after――only now!!)

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Eeeeh, Laurel-san……!? 
In just a moment, you've come this far……!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Chowa-!? Don't tell me……!? 
Even against this full stamina Bakushin……!?

The speed and form of her run was――stunning. It was 
a running style that emphasized slamming her feet in 
to the ground to push forward. She was almost like――

――A cherry blossom petal dancing through the air. 
Even though it seemed like she was flying, it was 
obvious that a huge burden was placed on her weakened legs.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
That's right. My form is a little unusual, and while 
I can't run much, just a little is fine♪ And also……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: I have a――"dream" I want to fulfill.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
……Yes. I'm looking for someone that wants to see 
that "dream" together with me. For that reason……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
I'm thinking of entering a Selection race soon. 
After all, with my legs being the way they are, 
there might be only one chance to run at full strength……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text: But, I intend to put everything in to that one chance!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ooooh, a Selection race! 
So you've finally resolved yourself, Laurel-san!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text:
Uuuu……I want to cheer for you but, I can't help but worry~. 
At least, don't push yourself too hard……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
Yeah! I don't plan on being reckless. 
I just want to do my best to show what I can do right now.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
That's why, if you're up for it, why don't 
you come watch, Trainer-san? ――My run, that is.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Laurel
text_block_list.text:
To see if I can really perform in the Twinkle Series, 
and whether I'm an Uma Musume that can fulfill that dream……!

My expectations were rising. 
And at the same time――so were my worries.

Even with those Legs of Glass, would Sakura Laurel really be able 
to run to the end in the Selection race and shine brightly?
